description:
In this course, hosted by Jack Carr, someone who knows what its like to learn from online video tutorials, you will learn HTML and CSS, this will include everything you need to create a professional level static website. We strive to really make you understand the core concepts behind the language.

 
We believe that if you truly understand what you are reading, you will be able to learn at a much quicker pace and implement the knowledge and skills much easier. We make sure to guide you through at a good pace. Being a native English speaker, you will be able to understand exactly what is going on.

In this competitive and always increasing online world, knowing HTML and CSS will give you the head start on the competition. Knowing how to build your very own beautiful websites will open many doors and lines of income.

There is an  instructor on hand almost 24/7 to answer all of your questions. We do this is a full time job so we are always available on facebook too. We truly believe that if we go above and beyond we can change the lives of those around us.

There is truly no better way to learn HTML and CSS. We offer one of the most comprehensive HTML and CSS courses online at one of the best prices. We believe that if you buy a video course that's what you should receive. That is why our courses are 100% video. No slides to confuse you.
title: HTML and CSS Beginner Guide
